text: Got big box deal but it wasn't really a deal. Ad said $19.95 but charged me $30. Hawaiian luau pizza had very little ham and even less pineapple. Girl that brought the box outside wasn't wearing a mask. I guess this is what you get when you hire a bunch of high school kids.

text: Waitress was nice.  Ordered large extra pepperoni pizza,  black Forest ham sandwich and supremo sandwich.  Got regular pepperoni pizza,  two very poor quality black Forest ham sandwiches, no supremo.  Took over thirty minutes and it was not busy at 4 on new years Eve (today).  Bad experience to say the least.  Won't be back.
